definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: I think the cup of 34E is absolutely niubable, you should be proud of.
sentences.chinese: 我认为34E罩杯是很值得牛逼的，你应该感到骄傲。

sentences.english: Today, I told my mom that I'd outgrown one of my tank tops because I've gone up two cup sizes since buying it.
sentences.chinese: 今天我对我妈说我的罩杯大了两号有件背心穿不下了。

sentences.english: Order a course of treatment, actually increased for more than a cup.
sentences.chinese: 订购了一个疗程，居然增大了一个多罩杯。

sentences.english: More than half of women in that country wear a size D cup.
sentences.chinese: 在英国，一半以上的女性穿D罩杯。

sentences.english: I am yet to see a bra with different cup sizes.
sentences.chinese: 我一直期望能见到一个左右罩杯不一样的胸罩。

sentences.english: Get a molded underwire bra especially if you’re a D or larger .
sentences.chinese: 拥有塑性文胸，特别是如果你是D罩杯或更大尺寸时。

sentences.english: She just wanted to restore herself to the nicely-filled B cup she was before her pregnancies.
sentences.chinese: 她只是想重新穿B罩杯，就像她怀孕前那样。

sentences.english: This will tighten your band size while keeping your cup volume the same.
sentences.chinese: 这会使你的罩杯体积不变的同时让你的后背紧起来。

sentences.english: This kind of problem often occurs in the molding of large-sized shape cups.
sentences.chinese: 此类问题在尺码比较大的罩杯加工过程中经常发生。

sentences.english: A bra's straps allow you to modify how the cups fit and support your breasts.
sentences.chinese: 胸罩背带使得你可以调整罩杯来适应和支撑你的胸部。

sentences.english: I have added a full cup size.
sentences.chinese: 现在我已经整整增大了一个罩杯。

sentences.english: More than 60% East beauties are A or B cup.
sentences.chinese: 60%以上的东方女性都是A或者B罩杯。

sentences.english: So how do you calculate your chest and cup measurements?
sentences.chinese: 所以，你如何来测算你的胸围和罩杯大小呢？

sentences.english: Bras should lay flat one on top of the other in your drawer, cup to cup.
sentences.chinese: 文胸应当在抽屉里层层叠放，罩杯贴罩杯。

sentences.english: Bras should lay flat one on top of the other in your drawer, cup to cup.
sentences.chinese: 文胸应当在抽屉里层层叠放，罩杯贴罩杯。

sentences.english: These unclip between the cups at the front of the bra.
sentences.chinese: 需要解开的扣子在前面两个罩杯的中间。
